text: Prince Haji 'Abdul 'Azim of Brunei (; 29 July 1982 â€“ 24 October 2020) was the second born prince of Hassanal Bolkiah, Sultan of Brunei. He was fourth in line to succeed the throne of Brunei until his death in October 2020. Prince Azim died on 24 October 2020 at the age of 38 following a long illness in Jerudong, Brunei. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Movie producers Category:Princes and princesses Category:Bruneian people
title: Prince Azim of Brunei
